data.title: Matching Donations – The Metropolitan Symphony Orchestra
data.text:
Matching Donations

Please check with your employer or organization for the most up-to-date information on matching donations. Below is a partial list of organizations that match individual contributions. This list is subject to change. For more information please call us at 612-567-6724 or email the MSO Executive Director.
